================
Heliacal details
================

The function ``heliacal_pheno_ut()`` provides data that are relevant for the
calculation of heliacal risings and settings. This function does not provide
data of heliacal risings and settings, just some additional data mostly used
for test purposes. To calculate heliacal risings and settings, please use the
function ``heliacal_ut()`` documented further above
(See :doc:`heliacal_risings_and_settings`).

.. autofunction:: swisseph.heliacal_pheno_ut

..
